CmdLine: cd /tmp &&     wget http://libsdl.org/release/SDL2-devel-${SDL_VERSION}-mingw.tar.gz &&     tar -zxf SDL2-devel-${SDL_VERSION}-mingw.tar.gz &&     cd SDL2-${SDL_VERSION} &&     sed -i "s#CROSS_PATH := /usr/local/cross-tools#CROSS_PATH := /usr#" Makefile &&     make install cross &&    rm -r /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp &&     wget http://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image/release/SDL2_image-devel-${SDL_IMAGE_VERSION}-mingw.tar.gz &&     tar -zxf SDL2_image-devel-${SDL_IMAGE_VERSION}-mingw.tar.gz &&     cd SDL2_image-${SDL_IMAGE_VERSION} &&     sed -i "s#CROSS_PATH := /usr/local/cross-tools#CROSS_PATH := /usr#" Makefile &&     make install cross &&    rm -r /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run

CmdLine: cd /tmp &&     wget http://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_ttf/release/SDL2_ttf-devel-${SDL_TTF_VERSION}-mingw.tar.gz &&     tar -zxf SDL2_ttf-devel-${SDL_TTF_VERSION}-mingw.tar.gz &&     cd SDL2_ttf-${SDL_TTF_VERSION} &&     sed -i "s#CROSS_PATH := /usr/local/cross-tools#CROSS_PATH := /usr#" Makefile &&     make install cross &&    rm -r /tmp/*
Commands.Name: run
